WRITING.TITLE: My father asked for the Wi-Fi password...
WRITING.TEXT:

After three failed attempts to log on, he asked, Am I spelling this right? T-A-P-E-D-U-N-D-E-R-T-H-E-M-O-D-E-M?
I've never been one to utilize sesquipedal words.

WRITING.TEXT: I don't mean give it up in that sense. I mean to quit something. If someone asks me 'Is he still working at that restaurant', I would say 'He turned it in years ago.'
